alert.note: Alert for Beaver (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued March 29 at 2:10PM CDT until March 31 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR THE EASTERN PANHANDLES... * Affected Area...In Oklahoma...Beaver. In Texas...Ochiltree... Lipscomb...Roberts...Hemphill...Gray...Wheeler...Donley and Collingsworth. * 20 Foot Winds...West 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 8 percent. * Red Flag Threat Index...6 to 8 with the higher threat to the south. * Timing...9 AM Friday morning through 10 PM Friday evening.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that the potential for critical fire weather conditions exists. Listen for later forecasts and possible red flag warnings.
